short_summary: Procurement of office furniture for Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to the National Capital Region.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Contract Number
WS4341928457

### Amendment Number
2

### Tender Reference Number
WS4341928457-Doc4342107929

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement

### Description
The Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) Department has a requirement for the procurement of Individual Height Adjustable Work Surfaces (category 2 and 5 office furniture) for installation in the National Capital Region.

### Important Notice
A revised closing time has been announced. Please disregard the previous Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and the CanadaBuys posting closing time. All supporting documentation and bids are due by 14:00 EST on December 22, 2023. Bids submitted after this time frame will be considered non-responsive.

### Tender Information
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4341928457
* **Publication Date:** December 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 22, 2023 (14:00 EST)
* **Place of Bid Submission:** Tenderers are required to submit their bids electronically through the CanadaBuys online portal
* **Notice URL:** [Direct Link to Tender](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18231683?extsite=MTgyMzE2ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contracting Entity
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Point of Contact
* **Name:** Julien, Annick
* **Email:** annick.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Classification Information
* **UNSPSC Code:** 56101700 (Office furniture)
